data.text:
Princess Faika of Egypt1

F, #701531, d. 7 January 1983

Last Edited=20 Jul 2019

Princess Faika of Egypt was the daughter of King Fuad I of Egypt and Nazli Sabri.1 She married Fuad Sadek.2 She died on 7 January 1983.2

Citations

[S212] Obituaries, The Independent, London, U.K.. Hereinafter cited as The Independent.

[S219] Announcements, New York Times, New York, U.S.A.. Hereinafter cited as New York Times.

King Farouk I of Egypt1

M, #701532, d. 1965

Last Edited=23 Jan 2019

King Faourk I of Egypt,

Queen Farida

and Princess Ferial, c 1938 2

King Farouk I of Egypt was the son of King Fuad I of Egypt and Nazli Sabri.1 He and Narriman Sadek were divorced.3 He married, secondly, Narriman Sadek.3 He married, firstly, Safinaz Zulfikar in 1939.3 He and Safinaz Zulfikar were divorced in 1948.3 He died in 1965 at Italy.3

He abdicated as King of Egypt in 1952.3

Children of King Farouk I of Egypt and Safinaz Zulfikar

Princess Fadia of Egypt3

Princess Fawzia of Egypt3 d. 2005

Princess Ferial of Egypt+3 b. 17 Nov 1938, d. 29 Nov 2009

Child of King Farouk I of Egypt and Narriman Sadek

Prince Ahmed Fuad of Egypt+3 b. Jan 1952

Citations

[S212] Obituaries, The Independent, London, U.K.. Hereinafter cited as The Independent.

[S130] Wikipedia, online http;//www.wikipedia.org. Hereinafter cited as Wikipedia.

[S466] Notices, The Telegraph, London, UK. Hereinafter cited as The Telegraph.

Mohammed Reza Pahlavi, Shah of Iran1

M, #701533, b. 26 October 1919, d. 27 July 1980

Last Edited=4 Mar 2018

Mohammed Reza Pahlavi 2

Mohammed Reza Pahlavi, Shah of Iran was born on 26 October 1919 at Tehran, Iran.3 He was the son of Reza Shah Pahlavi, Shah of Iran and Tadj ol-Molouk.3 He married Farah Diba.3 He married Princess Fawzia bint Fuad of Egypt, daughter of King Fuad I of Egypt and Nazli Sabri, in 1939.1 He and Princess Fawzia bint Fuad of Egypt were divorced in 1948.1 He married Princess Soraya Esfandiari-Bakhtiari on 12 February 1951.3 He and Princess Soraya Esfandiari-Bakhtiari were divorced in 1958.3 He died on 27 July 1980 at age 60 at Egypt.3

Children of Mohammed Reza Pahlavi, Shah of Iran and Farah Diba

Crown Prince Reza Pahlavi3

Prince Alireza Pahlavi3 b. 1966, d. 2011

Princess Leila Pahlavi3 b. 27 Mar 1970, d. 2001

Citations

Rosamond Blakiston

F, #701536

Last Edited=11 Sep 2017

Consanguinity Index=0.0%

Rosamond Blakiston is the daughter of Sir Matthew Blakiston, 3rd Bt. and Lucy Mann. She married Reverend Gerard Nevile, son of Reverend Henry William Nevile and Amelia Mann.

Her married name became Nevile.

Richard Nevill1

M, #701537

Last Edited=11 Sep 2017

Consanguinity Index=0.03%

Richard Nevill is the son of Charles Nevill and Lady Georgiana Bingham.1

He was appointed Companion, Order of the Indian Empire (C.I.E.)1

Child of Richard Nevill

Major Cosmo Charles Richard Nevill+1

Citations

[S1122] Peerage News, online http://peeragenews.blogspot.co.nz/. Hereinafter cited as Peerage News.

Major Cosmo Charles Richard Nevill1

M, #701538

Last Edited=11 Sep 2017

Major Cosmo Charles Richard Nevill is the son of Richard Nevill.1

He lived at Eccleston, Leamington Spa, Warwickshire, England.1 He was appointed Officer, Order of the British Empire (O.B.E.)1 He was awarded the Distinguished Service Order (D.S.O.)1

Child of Major Cosmo Charles Richard Nevill

Maj.-Gen. Cosmo Alexander Richard Nevill+1 b. 14 Jul 1907, d. 19 Sep 2002

Citations

[S1122] Peerage News, online http://peeragenews.blogspot.co.nz/. Hereinafter cited as Peerage News.

Maj.-Gen. Cosmo Alexander Richard Nevill1

M, #701539, b. 14 July 1907, d. 19 September 2002

Last Edited=1 Oct 2017

Maj.-Gen. Cosmo Alexander Richard Nevill was born on 14 July 1907.1 He was the son of Major Cosmo Charles Richard Nevill.1 He married Grania Goodliffe, daughter of Major Guy Vernon Goodliffe and Grace Eleanor Shaw, on 16 July 1934.1 He died on 19 September 2002 at age 95.1

He was appointed Companion, Order of the Bath (C.B.)1 He was appointed Commander, Order of the British Empire (C.B.E.)1 He was awarded the Distinguished Service Order (D.S.O.)1 He gained the rank of Colonel between 1959 and 1963 in the Royal Fusiliers.1

Children of Maj.-Gen. Cosmo Alexander Richard Nevill and Grania Goodliffe

Cosmos Guy Richard Nevill2

Charmian Eleanor Geraldine Nevill+2 b. 1939, d. 12 Aug 2018
